nodes.text: Lanitha was a female Twi'lek who lived on the planet Ryloth during the waning years of the Galactic Republic.

Lanitha was employed as a serving girl in the Fungus Pit, a cantina that was located in Bashka, on Ryloth. When the heroes of Cularin visited the cantina during the time of the Clone Wars, Lanitha greeted them and asked them if she could get them anything.
